text: Spyridon P. Chazapis (; 1872, in Andros – ?) was a Greek swimmer. He competed at the 1896 Summer Olympics in Athens. Chazapis competed in the 100 metres freestyle for sailors event. He placed second of the three swimmers. title: Spyridon Chazapis
